website_summaries.verdict: The best camera flash that comes with a kit with accessories helpful for getting the correct lighting in most situations.
pros: Included flash diffuser and remote make it easy to use the camera flash in creative ways for better results
Flash has some fast settings for capturing quick action or greater details in the photo
Includes flash,  flash stand, flash diffuser, drawstring pouch, universal wireless remote control,  batteries and cleaning cloth
cons: Some camera hot shoes do not work properly with the camera flash unless in manual mode

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Darn Awesome For the Price.  See my video review.
customer_reviews.text: I researched and read many reviews of flashes before buying this one, and I'm really glad I did. This Flash is perfect for price and good value. No it can't do TTL or anything fancy like that but if you want a manual flash that's easy to operate and reliable with a decent build quality then this is your best bet. It's plenty powerful enough and also comes with a terrific little soft box which is incredibly useful and can also be used for other classes as well.
customer_reviews.author: J. K.

customer_reviews.title: This is my first one since I am a beginner and it was easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: So far, I am really enjoying this speed light! This is my first one since I am a beginner and it was easy to set up and use. The one thing I had problems with was trying to figure out how to put the soft box on because it does not come with directions but I eventually figured it out. I can also hook this up and use it as a flash off camera because I also bought a wireless flash trigger from the same company. I love Altura products and will continue to buy them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with flash professional kit.
customer_reviews.text: As a college student perusing a photography career and is on a tight budget this flash is excellent! I'm happy with the photos it took the lighting was perfect. Everything was delivered as expected and in excellent condition. This was worth the money and I'll be buying more products from Goja.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED: BUYER BEWARE!!! Battery door gave out after 3 months at a wedding!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing worked pretty good. But only lasted about 3 months. The battery compartment gave out on a wedding I shot yesterday!!! The door to the compartment didn't close all the way. I tried my hardest to fix it but it wouldn't fix. Turns out the bottom part of the battery circuit is broken. I've changed the batteries once The WORST thing that happened in this wedding. A bunch of shots are either you dark, or very grainy because my ISO had to be so high. I won't be buying again and don't recommend anyone else buying unless you only need it for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: allhaildahypnotoadz

customer_reviews.title: Love it💜
customer_reviews.text: I've been a photographer for many years now and this flash is just a trusty affordable go to for me. I also love the altura softbox to go with it.. trust me, spend the extra couple bucks and get the soft box as well, I use it often for weddings especially for reception.. there is a bit of a delay with this one. About 2.5 to 3 second delay. However if you know what you're doing and you're on a budget this flash is just as worthy as the big guys..
customer_reviews.author: JeeperGirl

customer_reviews.title: Worked for only 1 week
customer_reviews.text: Worked for when I used it for the first Week, never after that. Slave mode 1 and 2 never will fire any more no matter what I try. The test button will fire the flash but that is the only way to get it to fire. I cannot understand junk like this. The remote control is worthless as well not compatible with many cameras. Cannot return because I did not notice it died until after the 30 day return period. Out $39
customer_reviews.author: stompersly

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have Nikon D5500 , I bought this flash and I onki used it once. When I need the most I went out shooting for a party and the flash seemed to work okay. I got home and realized that the swivel on the flash seemed loose. I looked at my flash to see that it had a big crack in it. I did not drop this flash as a matter of fact I've been really careful with it . It will break easily I'm very disappointed. I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS FLASH
customer_reviews.author: Wilmer

customer_reviews.title: Value & Quality Go Together
customer_reviews.text: Long story short I was switching vocations from a concert photographer to an event photographer so I needed a decent flash as well as some accessories. This set didn't have everything, but it had enough to get the job done on short notice. Now like any other flash it drains the batteries fast so expect to restock between shoots and the "built-in" diffuser is no replacement for a proper flash diffuser. It's a solid purchase for first-time flash users and good quality at a very good price. I'm thinking of buying a pair for some studio setups.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected for my Canon T6i
customer_reviews.text: I have a Canon EOS Rebel T6i. Time will tell how long this flash will function but after playing with this and watching some YouTube videos, I can truly say I LOVE IT! Works like a charm. Only manual settings but from what I've learned if you are going to be a great photographer you have to get out of auto and get into manual anyway. Works on the hot boot and off in S1 mode just fine and playing with some settings like brightness and aperture I got some of the clearest photos so far with this instead of the built in flash. For the price, the quality is great. So far so good. I'm a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Good manual flash
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good flash. It's fast and with the different strength settings allows for a range of brightnesses for different distances. The one primary piece to be aware of, this flash only has a single connector when mounting to the camera. The one connector is used to read the "fire" command from the camera. There are at least 3 other connectors for more advanced used.
customer_reviews.author: Rimaik

customer_reviews.title: Canon 7D
customer_reviews.text: Canon 7D All I can say is I generally do not use a flash when I am shooting. But, I was the photographer for a 300 people Christmas Party event so I knew I was going to need an external flash. I loved it. The pics came out great and the customer was thrilled, which is really all that matters. The flash is easy to pack and I have to say, people loved the little lens cover. I tried different settings to see which worked the best. If you want an external flash at a good price, I would say buy this one!!! I love mine.
customer_reviews.author: Allie Raye

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material, badly made.
customer_reviews.text: I am very dissapointed with this Flash. Pictures came out decent, but material felt cheap, a part look crooked or popping out. Then a couple uses later, the inside battery piece fell off which is what detects the batteries. Now it's unusable because there is no way it turns on. The only thing I liked from this product, was the free wristband it came with.
customer_reviews.author: BertMedia

customer_reviews.title: Neewer is better with auto low power mode
customer_reviews.text: Fires fine like other brand, but I don't like followings. 1) Attaching to hot shoe is terrible. It get stuck badly. Neewer has effortless in and out. 2) Altura let drain batteries all the way to zero if I forget to turn off. Neewer has a auto low power mode function to save batteries. Although the accessories are nice and affordable, the main body has weaknesses.
customer_reviews.author: Onsenboy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and lights my subjects beautifully.
customer_reviews.text: I have had a Canon Speedlite for a long time, and found it too complicated to learn (even with the guide book I purchased.) This little gem went on right sway and worked easily. Thank goodness that I bought one for both my niece and me. She's new to a dSLR and needed "easy", too.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Wesserling

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgraded flash
customer_reviews.text: This thing gets super bright and reloads very quickly even at max brightness. The color is very true, and doesn't color the subject unnecessarily. You'll want a different way to diffuse it, though. The fold-up box that comes with it isn't great. You probably want to fire it straight up and use a real diffuser. Remote works great with my Nikon D3300 on the first try.
customer_reviews.author: Mister B

customer_reviews.title: Kit (remote) is not compatible with all cameras listed
customer_reviews.text: The universal remote does not work with all the cameras listed. I checked the company website and confirmed this about my Nikon d7100 The flash communicates with the hot shoe mount on top with no problem. You just cannot use it remotely.
customer_reviews.author: NomadTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great flash for beginner, Canon Rebel T6i
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my external flash. It works well with my Canon Rebel T6i. I am at beginner level for photography, it’s a hobby. At first, the flash didn’t work when I mounted it on the hot shoe. But after watching some videos from Izzy on the digital goja YouTube page, I learned how to use the flash correctly and now it fires away! Turns out it was user error when it didn’t work correctly, I tightened it too much. The flash also takes about 30 secs to warm up and be ready to fire. I am happy with the product, pouch and can’t wait to learn more about photography.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce and Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Good no Good
customer_reviews.text: I lost my flash light and I had to purchase something fast and cheap for a wedding shooting and oh my oh my! It worked perfectly in the beggining and stopped working suddenly in the middle of the night! Some people might have a different experience but it was too heavy for my mirrorless camera! Don’t recommend for small cameras!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good! I got this because I wanted to make sure I could provide good lighting as backup for a wedding I have coming up. I didn’t want to spend a ton on a speedlite because I’m usually only doing natural light photography. But I was pretty impressed with how good this worked! And the price was great as well. This should work for what I need it to since I don’t really rely on speedlites for my work.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rocafort

customer_reviews.title: Love the soft box for the flash
customer_reviews.text: This pack contained a great combo of items for a starter kit. The flash is great and allows you to angle it in any direction, even backwards to bounce flash. My favorite addition is the soft box cover. It really has improved my photos. The only thing that I didn't realize when I bought it (mind you I'm still a beginner in the DSLR world) is that this flash only synchs up to a shutter speed of 1/200. So it works great for most things, but fast moving toddlers/pets.... not so much. Update: Only lasted until April 2016. Less than a year. Super disappointed as there is no way to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This flash stopped working after one use. It only lights up half the image. There is literally and line where the flash lit up and complete darkness on the other half. Total waste of money. By the time I went to use it for the second time, it was too late to get my money back. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: NICK C.

customer_reviews.title: 🖕🏼🖕🏼🖕🏼
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't recommend. Did research and was told this flash would work for my canon 60D. Yeah right. Got the flash kit and was super excited, flash won't connect to the camera or even work. Had to literally use it by pressing the button manually. No response when j messaged the seller. Pretty much tossed it to the top shelf of my closet and it's been sitting there since. Should have listen to my friend and bought a more expensive flash.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Katoku

customer_reviews.title: Died During Session
customer_reviews.text: Had this for less than two months and it died in the middle of a photo session. This was only the second time using it. Changed out the batteries, let it sit for a while, then tried again. Nothing. Very displeased.
customer_reviews.author: kcotton4166

customer_reviews.title: Not the best purchase
customer_reviews.text: At first, it worked fine. I got at least 4-5 shoots in with no problem. However, after those shoots, it began to act “funny.” It would flash on the interface, but I would just turn it off and back on. Now, it doesn’t work at all, and I feel disappointed with the purchase. I would not suggest buying this product if you are using your camera on a serious note.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Roachford

customer_reviews.title: Good flash overall but didn't even last me a year
customer_reviews.text: This was the first external flash I ever bought and it worked really well. I never had any problems and the flash never showed any problems either until recently. A piece that is located where the batteries are supposed to be placed broke off and now the flash won't even turn on. I didn't notice until right before a photoshoot and made my job more difficult and stressful. I take care of my equipment and always make sure the equipment is in a place where they can't be damaged so it must be extremely sensitive to travel in a bag. I would recommend if it would have lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to do some portraits because I needed the flash to bounce off the ceiling. I used it once and placed it in my camera bag. Then two weeks later, I open my bag to use it again...the battery door won't stay closed and keeps popping open. Really unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: ColdWarVet75

customer_reviews.title: The best camera flash out there
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera flash as a present and it was worth every penny. What a wonderful product, works great on canon T3i.. pictures are so beautiful with this flash. If you are looking for a camera flash this is a what you need. I recommend, recommend buy it. Works wonders on the brightness of the pictures. You can adjust the brightness which is a great feature.. it was a great father's day present and the seller is wonderful reaching out if any issues if we were happy with the flash or any issues. Great product and great customer service..
customer_reviews.author: val

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little optical slave flash or manual hot-shoe mounted flash ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little optical slave flash or manual hot-shoe mounted flash for learning photography. Even at a high level of photography, if you know your gear you can use this little guy to light your shots as well as ANY non TTL/HSS flash. The recharge speed between firing the flash isn't bad, and at this price point you really can't beat it. A pair of these as slaves with one smart flash and a few gels is all you really need do anything from portraits to product photography.
customer_reviews.author: Geordie & Lina

customer_reviews.title: Received a defective product
customer_reviews.text: So first off the price is really good for affordable flash for your camera, a few days into it the flash suddenly would not fire off even with new batteries. So I emailed the company and they sent me a replacement with one that has scratches and now new in my opinion, so at this stage I was done, and rather get another product for a higher price.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Pizarro

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend this product, but for the price I would have kept it if I'd gotten it to work.
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning this product. Personally I wasn't impressed with the quality. Opening and closing the battery compartment was difficult (I felt like I was going to break it. The batteries that came with the product were defective, and there was a residue on the flash itself. There wasn't an ease of use with this product and I couldn't get it to work with my Canon Rebel T6i. I wouldn't recommend this product but for the price I would have kept it if I'd gotten it to work. In hind sight I will purchase a soft box with out openings in the side.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the price!😃
customer_reviews.text: Flash is strong!!! Really like how it performs. When we first got it the battery for the remote control was already drained, we notified the seller and they Quickly send us a replacement. Over all, Very Happy with it!!! It’s definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jason G

customer_reviews.title: Flash burnt out in less than a few months, seller unresponsive (edited - seller fixed)
customer_reviews.text: Product worked for a few months before it broke, bought the extended warranty and had to use manufacturer warranty. Manufacturer is standing behind warranty however the seller actually has my flash unit They will not answer my emails or return my flash; I have delivery confirmation of my flash unit arriving at their location. Edited: the seller sent me a new flash! Thanks for making it right.
customer_reviews.author: Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!  Great little set!
customer_reviews.text: I gm surprisingly pleased with this flash set. I got it for my wife as a Christmas present who is getting into photography but didn't know what she needed. The flash is plenty powerful enough for beginner photography and acts a slave flash as well. The camer remote is a nice touch, although took me a little while to figure out how to make it work with my camera. The diffuse hood is a bit of a joke since it constantly falls off the flash, especially if the flash is moving with the camera, but it will work in a pinch - and its still nice to have when
customer_reviews.author: CaliDreamer

customer_reviews.title: Partially compatible with FujiFilm FinePix S1
customer_reviews.text: This flash works with Fujifilm FinePix S1 camera but with limitation of functions. It does not work as a smart flash, as the original are expected to work because the plug for the hotshoe does not have the specific FujiFilm pins. It cannot work as a wireless flash with this particular camera. Making several attempts to adapt the exposition to the conditions of shooting produces perfect results. Two months later I had to buy a FujiFilm external flash for taking full advantage of the FinePix S1 camera. AP-UNV1 has nice design but is just a basic camera. It is not easy to use it with a relatively advanced digital camera.
customer_reviews.author: David BenJoseph

customer_reviews.title: Stop functioning in less than a year.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a second speedlight for my business and at first it was working. But recently, for no reason all of the indicator lights will come and stay on till I press the off button. It does not fit my Nikon camera and it does not work any more. I had to do a shoot with only one speedlight when I needed two and that was not cool! Wish I could exchange it, but too late. Oh well. had it less than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Nadja

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 2 weddings....
customer_reviews.text: I used it for 2 weddings. At the 3rd wedding, it stopped working. It's okay for beginners. But do not buy if you shoot events or weddings. It will fail :( Update - I changed my review to 3 stars because the customer service is great. The company contacted me and issued a refund for the defective flash, which was a very kind and respectable thing for them to do.
customer_reviews.author: KaeCole Media Photography

customer_reviews.title: When it works its great, problem is that it doesn't always work
customer_reviews.text: When this flash works, it performs well and I can bounce light where I need to make nice pictures. The flash is not very reliable however that it will work. Its not the batteries because I've tried to change them and I still get inconsistent results on whether it will power on or not. Probably not worth the little money it costs.
customer_reviews.author: Bryappie

customer_reviews.title: Altura Flash w/ remote.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great flash. I am using it as a fill flash for a photo session I have with a movie producer. I couldn't figure out how to synch this to my sony flash HVL-F43M so I purchased the NEEWER flash synch they sell on Amazon. The flash is adjustable for strength of flash so the room I will initially use it in. FGlash seems to do the job...
customer_reviews.author: P. Cox photography

customer_reviews.title: speedlight
customer_reviews.text: so far the flash is easy to use n handle it heavy on my camera but this is my first speedlight am very please with it that night i practicing using the speedlight they turn out good i like how u can in just the light to ur liking now i dont have to push my iso high any more n take beautiful pic
customer_reviews.author: jamie harris

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 weeks of use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this external flash because it has good reviews and I needed something affordable. I guess you get what you pay for. I work as a contract photographer and am required to have a speedlight. Unfortunately, this stopped working after using it for only 3 weeks. The flash does not respond, and it eventually quit flashing all together. I thought it may be the batteries and changed them, but this did not work. It's been pretty inconvenient, and I'll have to purchase a new speedlight. I was hoping this flash would live up to its reviews, but I've discovered that I wasted my money on something this cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Helen Brighton

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic speed light.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a graphic designer and art director by trade and in a pinch I'm called on to take photos for any project I may be working on. I have photography training going all the way back to college. This is a fantastic little speed light that I use on camera. I've used more expensive Canon and Nikon flashes before and for my purposes (product photography, model shoots) this does the job at a fraction of the cost. The tilt-swivel flash head is my favorite feature of this product as I can bounce light from many different directions to really sculpt the light around my subject.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Good flash
customer_reviews.text: It was wonderful love the way you could have different setting I used it at a wedding and photos were amazing. Had it for 6 months probably used it 4 time. Well just recently it stop working. I would turn it on and it would light up all the setting lights and not work. But then i switched the batteries i guess it lets you know when the batteries were low
customer_reviews.author: Rojo85

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work on my camera and batteries get hot!
customer_reviews.text: First, this did not work on my Nikon D3300. Second, after putting the batteries in it the batteries got extremely (dangerously) hot! We even tried brand new batteries and had the same result. I returned mine.
customer_reviews.author: Christy S.

customer_reviews.title: Very well built -- Ultra Bright flash
customer_reviews.text: It takes a little tweaking to get it just right. the remote does not work with Canon M50. you need a bluetooth remote. not a IR.
customer_reviews.author: M. Woods

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: The receiver on this is pretty darn picky about where you are with the controller. It works, but not from every direction. I would recommend this for beginner photographers and shooting static subjects (like food, miniatures, etc.) when you don't need to be able to move around the shooting area. Intensity control is good, and I like the pull-out diffusion plate, although you need to be gentle with it in general, as this is not the most durable flash. This thing is pretty bulky as well. The little stand is close to useless. My favorite item that comes with the kit is the bag. I'd recommend for the photographer on a small budget, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great flash.  Versatile. Accessories, not so much.
customer_reviews.text: The flash diffuser I received used an elastic to secure it to the flash. I've used it a total of 3 times, and this past attempt, the elastic snapped. I never stretched it further than the flash size, and just slid the diffuser flaps under it. I see in the picture now, it has a Velcro strap, so I suppose I need to find a Velcro strap to order online. The flash itself works excellently.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable pricing but not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 of these speed lights. They worked well, however, all 3 had an issue with the battery doors. I had to tape them shut. I have discarded all 3 because of the battery door malfunction.
customer_reviews.author: KarenH

customer_reviews.title: Hot shoe mount was a nice fit with no slop
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly with my canon rebel T5, manual and slave as well. Hot shoe mount was a nice fit with no slop. The flash's flip down diffuser seems a bit flimsy. Remote is not compatible with the T5 and a tight fit rubber band rendered the cheaply made diffuser unusable. The diffuser is held together with a cheesy velcro strap. The batteries are junk as well. The flash itself seems decent for the money however don't spend the extra money on this kit and just buy the flash alone.
customer_reviews.author: Lee adkins

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Very good manual flash for the price. Easy to work with for an amateur photographer. The light diffuser creates an awesome effect. I didn't use the batteries that came with it because one reviewer said not to. I attached a few photos of my god daughter that I took while experimenting with my new flash. I'm a new fan of Alutra!
customer_reviews.author: Jones

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect for wedding photographer!
customer_reviews.text: I recently added this flash to my equipment collection due to its affordable nature. I used it to shoot a wedding this past weekend and it was flawless. The refresh time was hardly more than 3 seconds at its most, and it managed to consistently light the dark reception hall, even with rounds and rounds of burst photos. I had taken a backup and never even had to think about pulling it out! I reccomend changing the batteries semi often if you are constantly shooting, then you'll never have an issue!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Provides light... but is not compatible with with my NIKON
customer_reviews.text: Be careful... be sure that this is compatible with your camera. While it seems to work with my NIKON 3300, I was told by a professional that it is not compatible... as indicated by the one (not three) prongs on the base, which connects to camera... It does work, provides good light but does not communicate with the camera..
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Kron

customer_reviews.title: Great external flash
customer_reviews.text: I have two cameras, Canon T5 & Sony A6. This external flash worked perfect with both cameras. I am novice, and can truly see the difference between and external & built in flash. This one also came with batteries (have used for over 700 shots & still going) it came with a diffuser & shutter button. For some reason I can't get the shutter to work so I will give it another try. Definitely would purchase again! Enjoy the photos I took with this amazing flash!
customer_reviews.author: Mastiempo

customer_reviews.title: It's.gets a 98% Water resistant and tough
customer_reviews.text: This is my very first speedlight as amateur photographer. I chose it for the price. With my knack for dropping stuff and taking photos in the rain.i figured by cheap and then when. I get it wet or drop it no big deal just buy another one. Since getting it i have dropped it several times once in the mud been thru 3 heavy rain storms and it' still working. Still looks new. . I love it i dont see myself getting a more expensive one anytime In the near future. This is one tough flash. The Nikon D90 is my current camera
customer_reviews.author: A  E crall

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and works great
customer_reviews.text: Very happy i went with this flash. It does everything it is suppose to do and my photos are turning out extraordinary. easy to understand operation even for a beginner. Easy to get on and off the camera turning the dial on the bottom to tighten and loosen. The flash does swivel in up and down plus side to side directions. I would not hesitate to buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Mother And Daughter

customer_reviews.title: Short Lifespan
customer_reviews.text: I had thinking for 3 weeks before it completely gave out. I tried new batteries of tip brands, but that did nothing. I found out that it comes from the same manufacturer of the Amazon Prime speedlight, which is why the design is the same. I expected better from Altura. I recommend that if you do like the brand, I'd recommend buying their more expensive speedlights. I have the $80 speedlight from them and it had lasted about a year so far.
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: Broken after about 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Batteries Erode in the battery compartment, I went though 3 different types of batteries and they all seemed to blow out after about a month of leaving them in there. The flash gets hot after a few shots and sometimes just stops working. When you put it away it is easy to hit the switch to own without realizing it.
customer_reviews.author: Ajax L.

customer_reviews.title: Great for weddings
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a wedding shoot i was doing and it was amazing! I wasn't sure about the manual settings but it was very user friendly and after minor adjustments worked perfectly all day. Even at night i was able to get pictures that wouldn't have happened without this flash. Would HIGHLY recommend (especially for the price.)
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Laney

customer_reviews.title: Don't let this one get away!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this speed lite to gain more control over the dreaded red eye. Upon using this unit I discovered you can turn the head to face behind you using the wall to bounce the light to your subject thus virtually eliminating red eye. But Wait There's More! shadows also disappear, and all the while the sensor continues to face the subject giving you proper exposure
customer_reviews.author: Dennis P

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Flash with Remote!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Flash. Works great (in sync) with my new Nikon 5300 camera. The remote is very handy when you want to be included in a photo from a distance or to use it off the camera using the foot stand that comes with it for different angled lighting. I haven't tried either of the diffusers yet, but I'm sure it would provide nice soft lighting for portraits. I like the fact that the 1 diffuser is built into the flash itself. All you have to do is pull it out and flip it down. Very easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.author: JAMMY1Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy for a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Note: I have a Canon Rebel T5 Camera My package was sealed in a ziploc style bag. The speed flash was in a secure box, came with all batteries, the remote and soft box. Everything was package neat and well. Tested the flash, works like a charm! If you want a great quality speed flash and want to save money, this is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This a great bundle. I use it with my Cannon DSLR and it works perfectly. The settings are easy to use and it's very easy to connect to the camera. I've used it for a photo booth setup where it was in regular use throughout the length of the party. It worked perfectly and the batteries are still going strong. I used the soft box for the photo booth and it diffused the flash very well. I haven't had a reason to use the remote shutter release yet, but will update when I do.
customer_reviews.author: Derek D Stout

customer_reviews.title: The quality and reliability of both are very good. I'm very pleased just as I am pleased ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an inexpensive yet effective slaveable second flash. I looked at several options including the name brand versions. I chose this because it offered everything I needed at a very affordable price. What's more it offers more power than several of the other options I clouding some name brands. This is the second Altura flash I have purchased through Gojo. The quality and reliability of both are very good. I'm very pleased just as I am pleased with the caring and concern of Gojo! Superb service, great followup and speedy sevice
customer_reviews.author: Brent A Zerby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: This flash works great. I really am pleased with my purchase considering a normal flash would cost me about 200 bucks more! haha. The quality of the flash itself is actually really good. It is a sturdy build, very light in weight, and has a high powered flash at its strongest setting. I would recommend this to anyone looking for an inexpensive flash. I also really liked the letter that was mailed with it from the company. Great customer service. They offer a no fee return guarantee if you are not satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Char14

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive flash for the beginner.
customer_reviews.text: I have been very happy with this flash. I do only have a starter DSLR camera so I didn't want to spend a lot for the flash. When I get better with photography and get a more professional camera I will also get a more professional flash. For me right now it works fine. I'm using it on a Nikon D3300.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good and bad. Had to return.
customer_reviews.text: Does everything well, apart from stay together. The plastic is too cheap/brittle, and it cracked from the battery compartment up into the hinge area after a couple of uses. If this had been made from better quality materials it would be a winner. The remote is OK, but the button is a little hard to push (I got the Amazon basics version instead, much better), and the included button battery did not last more than 50 shots. Returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: jaceonwheels

customer_reviews.title: The design mimics the Canon line of flashes and is simple to set up in slave mode.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a second flash for my second light box. Synched up nicely with my Canon 7D and primary flash. Hot shoe mount fit nicely into my trigger holder and lightbox. The design mimics the Canon line of flashes and is simple to set up in slave mode. I am very pleased with the flash performance with both rechargeable and standard batteries. Very happy with this inexpensive flash to work with my portrait photography.
customer_reviews.author: f lapierre

customer_reviews.title: Product + Company = The best choice.
customer_reviews.text: Product quality, appearance, performance; 100% excellent. Costumer service: 1000%. Nothing more to say, super happy, product arrive quicker than I expect. I had one technical question, they answer me in less than 12 hour period. I will recommend this product and this company to everybody. I bought this one again, now for my new D7100 Nikon, the previous one was for my Fujiflim SX-1, both working at 100%. And yes if I need another in the future will be the same.
customer_reviews.author: Reroge

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for a really nice flash.
customer_reviews.text: I am so very happy with this flash! I was not sure if it would work with my NEX5, but it works fine just as long as you have the camera flash on. Doesn't seem to matter where the flash is placed, it triggers right along with my camera's. Photos are much more clear and rich with a better flash! I would love to thank the seller for all the extras that they include with the flash, this flash will get a lot of use!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and a must have!
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner photographer using Nikon D3300. I'd like to begin with huge Wow! So impressed ! This camera flash and diffuser plus other accessories like remote control are EVERYTHING! Exactly what I was looking for as a beginner. Definitely would recommend this to family and friends and would buy again! Also shipment is fast and the seller is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Shaheen S. Aldossary

customer_reviews.title: Hard for begginers
customer_reviews.text: It does not auto select the brightness so it can be harder for new photographers. Also if you are wondering, it does work on a mirrorless camera, I did not find anyone saying anything about that when I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I ordered this. I didn't use it much when I first started shooting, but I use it quite a bit now. I am a novice/hobbyist so I am still practicing with it, but it is amazing to play with and has exceeded my expectations. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: I made the right choice
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely pleased with not just the performance of the flash bundle but with the way it was delivered to me. First of all, it arrived at my home not in 2 days as promised but the very next morning. What a nice surprise! The bundled kit had all I needed plus more: the photo flash, flash stand, softbox flash diffuser, protective drawstring pouch, universal wireless remote control, four AA batteries, and a microfiber cleaning cloth. The photo flash is the first one I own and it exactly filled my requirement. All of that for such a good small price. I wish every purchase I ever made was such a joy. Thank you Digital Goja.
customer_reviews.author: L. Chung

customer_reviews.title: A great flash for my DSLR
customer_reviews.text: This flash kit has everything I need to add light to any subject. It also has the option to quickly adjust the flash level which I use quite often.
customer_reviews.author: Sahak D

customer_reviews.title: Tremendous Product
customer_reviews.text: This external flash is better than I had really expected. Being universal I thought they might cut corners, but not at all. I do photography for a small company and have had nothing but success using it. The kit was wonderful. The only thing I haven't used is the wireless remote. Because my camera doesn't have the capability. The diffuser is amazing. The flash is directional so I can change it based on my needs. A solid product from what I have experienced. Also the company really deserves a huge thumbs up. They are fantastic and seem as though all they really want is to make sure I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Davyn James

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.....
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup and pairing.. I used with with Canon T6S and 5D Mark ii. Works perfectly as Slave and on the hot shoe. Good budget flash. Altura has best quality products for the price....
customer_reviews.author: Wess

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this and have been very impressed. I also had to purchase a hot shoe adapter which I must thank Amazon for having both at a much better price than my local brick and mortar electronics store. I also appreciated that both items were prime. The unit is extremely quick to charge up and was able to sinc to my camera without any issues. I have no problems recommending this item and this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Mikki's Girl

customer_reviews.title: The flash is great for lighting up the area or possibly blinding anything ...
customer_reviews.text: The flash is great for lighting up the area or possibly blinding anything within a 100ft radius including yourself. I've used the remote and microfiber cable a lot more than I've used this flash. For the photography that I take, (primarily automotive and event photography) the flash is too bright and I can't find much use for it. The diffuser and lightbox are somewhat of a joke and don't seem to soften the light at all. Even on the lowest setting the light can be obnoxious and cause too much glare.
customer_reviews.author: Adam M.

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly for my needs on my Canon 70D DSLR ...
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for my needs on my Canon 70D DSLR, mostly for bounce-flashing. These two snapshots were taken in very dim conditions indoors with the flash pointing straight up and white bounce card extended. No harsh light on her face and no harsh shadow behind.
customer_reviews.author: Buneeb

customer_reviews.title: As Seen on TV, kinda.
customer_reviews.text: Nice flash. However, I did not receive the one in the photo (it does not have an LCD screen). Surprisingly, the remote worked with my Canon EOS, that was a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Black Light Org

customer_reviews.title: It only worked for 3 times, on the fourth ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to update my review. Even I rated it low for the first time, I got contacted by the vendor who kindly offered to replace the flash and it just arrived. So, I want to thank the vendor for the excelent customer service. I wasnt so lucky at the first time because my flash stopped working while I was on a session. But I have to say that it works very fine, it is easy to use and to read.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Lopez

customer_reviews.title: More than happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: This flash works great! It comes with a hole bunch of side things that I wasn't expecting but overall it works great. I use it for my nikon D7100 and D7000 and it seems to work perfectly. The flash settings are easily adjusted and instructions pretty simple. If you are starting and maybe looking for a cost effective choice for a flash, this would be it.
customer_reviews.author: kenny

customer_reviews.title: We are very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with this purchase. Not only did it arrive early, the price was perfect. We used it for our Christmas photo shoot and the results were all that we could have hoped for, thanks to the bundle. The seller also included a hand signed note guaranteeing our satisfaction. In the automated "press 2 to reach..." world we live in our family values proper customer service. They also followed up to ensure we were satisfied with the product. Not only are we pleased with the product, we are also very pleased with the quality of customer service. We'll definitely shop with them again!
customer_reviews.author: AWoodson

customer_reviews.title: but seems to work nicely - it's a little clunky to set up and ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow, they pack a lot of value in this kit! The flash has multiple modes and strength settings, it came with batteries (a definite plus), and the remote and diffuser really round out the package. The diffuser is a little cheesy, but seems to work nicely - it's a little clunky to set up and get on the flash, so don't try to use it in a hurry, all in all, this is one of the best values I've gotten in a package for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Vince Ruland

customer_reviews.title: Works great, just not in LIVE MODE on a Canon Rebel 2 Ti
customer_reviews.text: I would give it four stars, but I had some problems with it initially. It worked fine on my Canon Rbel T2i, as long as I was NOT IN LIVE MODE! No where in the directions does it say this. When I couldn't get it to work, I started googling it. I found the information after a lot of searching. When I had it working, it was great. Able to adjust the flash easily to get the effect I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: JoDi

customer_reviews.title: good speedlight
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a bower speedlight until I dropped it and it no longer worked so I was looking for another one wit out the heavy costs. I found this kit on amazon and so far I like it. I like how you can use it in manual or the other settings. I love the "soft box" defuse makes the light not so harsh. I was a bit sad the remote didn't work for my canon 50 but it's not a huge deal. I would definitely buy a few more as back ups until I could afford the canon speedlight.
customer_reviews.author: ILuvsBooks

customer_reviews.title: Good product and respect with their costumers
customer_reviews.text: The product is very good for the price. I’ve bought two flashes, but one of them came in a different order. I received only a diffuser and trigger instead of two of them. After entering in contact, they understood that returning was not a good option since I’m no longer in the US. They kindly made a partial refund, demonstrating the respect with their customers. Definitely recommend and would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: ricardo rabelo eustachio

customer_reviews.title: Love this flash
customer_reviews.text: Love this flash! It fits great on my D3200 and creates an awesome lighting! I also love that it's adjustable: you can direct your light either directly on the subject or angle up for the light to bounce off another surface. The intensity of light is also adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Quilting Artist

customer_reviews.title: Great Flash and Accessories
customer_reviews.text: I love this new flash. I use it more than my expensive one, and it came with everything! The price made me think twice about the quality, but when I received it I was more than pleased. It is so easy to use, and came with everything. It also arrived way ahead of schedule, which was also nice. This is a great company to do business with, and I will be purchasing from them again.
customer_reviews.author: E. Sloane

customer_reviews.title: good quality budget friendly flash
customer_reviews.text: for a beginner photographer this is a good starter flash for anyone on a budget. with the good quality and detailed instructions of the flash it did not take long to get familiar on how to operate efficiently.
customer_reviews.author: alex hoover

customer_reviews.title: Gave it to a friend as a gift but didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to a friend as a gift but didn't work. I don't know if I got a defective one or not but when I hook it up to my friend's Canon 60D it says the external flash is incompatible even though the item description it say the 60D can be used with this flash. Emailed the supplier, waiting for answers. So far it's been disappointing since it was a gift for a friend but it doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Wich

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a part-time photographer. Looking for a new speedlite for my personal camera (Sony a6000), I went into my local camera shop. They tried to sell me a $300 light... yeah, right. Took a chance on this Altura one, and it does the job just fine. Feels just as sturdy as the one I use at work, and a little lighter weight. Nothing fancy here, just a manual flash, but it's plenty strong and I have had no technical issues with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: The remote shutter button doesnt work, i received a ...
customer_reviews.text: The remote shutter button doesnt work, i received a video from the seller showing me how to make the remote work but mines didnt work at all. Did exactly what he demonstrated in the video and no luck. I have a EOS Rebel t6 and no where in the description when i bought this does it say, it may not work with all DSLR. Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: it's really pretty unbeatable! I like the little soft box it ...
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is surprisingly robust- it's quickly become my go-to auxiliary strobe unit... I often use it for travel too- for the price point, it's really pretty unbeatable! I like the little soft box it came with too.
customer_reviews.author: jkffcine

customer_reviews.title: My first external flash, and maybe my last!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this flash after upgrading my camera body to one without a built-in flash. It does everything it intends to, and the kit is a crazy value! I have more than I would ever need, or ever have expected at the price point. The flash is great, but the accessories are where the kit shines. The diffuser is a welcome addition, and the IR remote works great. My favorite thing in the kit though, by far, is the MicroFiber cloth. It is the best one I have ever used, ever!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I would bu and will buy this product again
customer_reviews.text: It took a while to sync with my camera but once it did it was just as good as my $300 dollar flash
customer_reviews.author: andrew hardy

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this for beginners but if your looking into photography for real get better top name brand items. This was amazing to practice with until i got comfortable with it.
customer_reviews.author: brittanycherry

customer_reviews.title: Gold Medal
customer_reviews.text: I needed to try out how good the Altura speedlights are before I buy the E-TTL for my Canon, so I bought the cheapest with the kit, and went on a 25 days vacation to Asia(Japan, HK, Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand, and Indonesia) with my Fuji X-E2 and X-M1(didnt want to carry my DSLR around)...after 1,426 flashes used (I kept record of it) during low light, and night time, it proved me how food Altura flashes are. So I'll be purchasing the E-TTl version in a couple of week.
customer_reviews.author: Don Von Floyd Stefanek

customer_reviews.title: Luckily that worked and all is good. BUT I now take the batteries out when ...
customer_reviews.text: NOTE: Don’t make the same mistake I made! While my flash unit sat idle for some time, I didn’t remove the batteries, so the batteries leaked in my flash and had to clean it with Isopropyl alcohol and a Q-tip. Luckily that worked and all is good. BUT I now take the batteries out when not in use. Other than that it works great for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Bourgault

customer_reviews.title: The price is great! However
customer_reviews.text: The price is great! However, I am having some issues getting it to flash properly with a Canon T2i in a manual mode. When I take the pictures to software I'm told that the flash didn't fire. I do see the flash go off but it is not coordinating with the exact time of the picture. It could be my fault in the camera settings. I hope I can get it to work properly.
customer_reviews.author: kenredhawk

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the quality of this product for the price!! Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

product_meta.title: Altura Photo AP-UNV2 Bundle DSLR and Mirrorless Camera Flash Speedlite for Canon Nikon Sony Olympus Panasonic
feature_bullets: MAKES A GREAT GIFT – The Altura Photo Professional Speedlite Flash (AP-UNV2) is a powerful manual flash with a High Guide No. 38(m). Suitable for photographers of all levels. High performance at a low cost.

EVERYTHING INCLUDED – The Altura Photo Camera Flash Kit includes; AP- UNV2 Speedlite Flash with LCD Screen, 4X AA Batteries, Universal Infrared Remote Control, Flash Diffuser Reflector, Carry Pouch and Stand.
UNIVERSAL COMPATIBILITY – Works with Canon, Nikon, Sony, Olympus, Pentax and any other DSLR with a standard Hot-Shoe connection. Not compatible with T7 and SL3.
HIGH PERFORMANCE – Use directly on your camera hot-shoe or as an off camera flash for portraits. Note: Flash does not work on TTL mode.
DIGITAL GOJA 90-DAY 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - If you're not happy with your flash for any reason, please contact us and we will take the product back for a full refund.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,900 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
